getFormula

public static CMLFormula getFormula(nu.xom.Element element)
gets formula for product or reactant. If product has a child formula, returns it, else returns the formula on molecules, else null. resulting CMLFormula is not aggregated

Parameters:
element -
Returns:
the product stoichiometry

mapReactantsToProducts

public CMLList mapReactantsToProducts(CMLReaction reaction,
                                      java.lang.String control)
                               throws CMLException
Calculates the mapping of reactant(s) to product(s) as a list CMLLink elements. linking atoms to atoms and bonds to bonds. Still experimental.

Parameters:
reaction -
control - has no reactants and/or products
Returns:
list of mappings (null if no mapping found)
